@Module.Name: Predict
@Module.Description: This module is a prediction model, predicting what will appear after clicking each components on current screen

@Module.Name: Select
@Module.Description: This module is a selection model, selecting the top 5 most possible component to be acted on catering to user's intent

@Module.Name: Plan

@Module.Name: Evaluate
@Module.Description: This module is an evaluation module, evaluating the selected components of their contribution to fulfilling the user's intent

@Module.Name: Decide
@Module.Description: This module is a decision module, deciding the final action based on the evaluation result, whether complete or wrong or go on
